content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 8, "index": 44}]
thought: To solve this task I need to craft quartz_pillar. This requires crafting quartz_block, which itself requires quartz. Therefore I will move the quartz from slot 44 to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed one quartz on the crafting table, but I still need another one to craft quartz_block. Therefore I will move another quartz from slot 44 to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 6, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed two quartz on the crafting table, but I still need another one to craft quartz_block. Therefore I will move another quartz from slot 44 to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 5, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed three quartz on the crafting table, but I still need another one to craft quartz_block. Therefore I will move another quartz from slot 44 to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]
thought: I have crafted the quartz_block, so I will move it from the crafting table to an empty slot in my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a quartz pillar, I first need to craft a quartz block. To do this, I will need to place two quartz blocks side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move one of the quartz blocks from slot 44 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I need to place another quartz block next to the one already in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the quartz block from slot 44 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]

thought: I have now crafted a quartz block, but I still need to craft a quartz pillar. To do this, I will need to place three quartz blocks in a vertical line in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the quartz block from slot 44 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I need to place another quartz block below the one already in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the quartz block from slot 44 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}]

thought: I have now crafted a quartz block, but I still need to craft a quartz pillar. To do this, I will need to place three quartz blocks in a vertical line in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the quartz block from slot 0 to slot 13.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}]

thought: I have all the ingredients needed to craft quartz_pillar. I need to place two quartz blocks on top of each other in the crafting table. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the quartz blocks to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}]
thought: Since I have already placed a quartz block in slot 1, I now need to place another quartz block below it in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 28, "index": 11}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}]
thought: Now that I have placed the quartz blocks correctly, I can craft the quartz pillars by moving them to an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 2
